review: Don't know if anyone else has mentioned it, but I found a workaround for the Netflix problem. I originally could not enter my Netflix account info using the included remote. I later downloaded the  Fire Stick Remote App using my Android phone to submit my info. Now both remote and phone can access Netflix programming.
author: Zepplyn "music fanatic"

review: The firestick (eventually) worked as advertized.  I wouldn't normally give a product five stars for doing what it's supposed to do, but in this case there was a problem.  When I got it hooked up, it was slow and worked only intermittently, and I eventually discovered, worked only when the remote control was within a couple of feet of the installed stick.  I called the 800 support number, worked with the tech until she was convinced of the problem and agreed to ship me a new stick.  It arrived in less than 24 hours, installed without a problem and I promptly watched the whole first season of 'Sons of Anarchy'.  Like the bumper sticker says, 's*** happens' so as far as I'm concerned, service is just as important as any product.  I give this product four stars for working and an extra star for great support/service!
author: Connie Warren
